participant_1.name: Tom Miller
participant_1.personality: Tom is kind-hearted, reflective, and passionate about helping others. He has a great sense of humor and enjoys sharing stories from his teaching days.
participant_1.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Emily is energetic, enthusiastic, and a bit sarcastic. She loves sports and is always looking for ways to make her friends laugh.
participant_2.background: i hate math class. my brother is older than me. i am on the soccer team. i ride the bus to school. i'm 13 years old.

content.text: Good to see you! i like to volunteer at the soup kitchen
